TopicTitle: Is it possible to assemble a ship in orbit?

Articles.Content:
Fairly simple question. I\'ve seen people assemble a space station in some screenshot... even if right now I have no idea how.

But is it possible to do it for a ship?

Check out this mod: [Orbital Construction](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10185.0)

I love it.

The other way is .sfs editing, where you put a station with no launch vehicle on the pad, go back to the space center, then change the orbital properties in the .sfs file in your KSP directory.

WARNING: BACK UP YOUR SAVE BEFOREHAND!
